metadata.title: CVE-2019-9656 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - negligible
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in LibOFX 0.9.14. There is a NULL pointerdereference in the function OFXApplication::startElement in the filelib/ofx_sgml.cpp, as demonstrated by ofxdump.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-9656` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libofx6 - 1:0.9.10-1+deb8u2build0.16.04.1
ofx - 1:0.9.10-1+deb8u2build0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libofx package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:0.9.10-1+deb8u2build0.16.04.1').
